Table.Message: The WHD has ordered an employer in Tuscon to pay over $300,000 to employees for back pay. We are notifying our valued Arizona employers about this significant enforcement statistic to remind you of the importance of complying with federal wage & hour laws.
For Testing.

New overtime rules taking effect Dec. 1 will impact an estimated 5,560 AK workers, who will need to be paid at least $47,476 annually to be exempt from overtime. We are notifying our AK employers about this new regulation to remind you of the importance of complying with wage & hour laws.

In Fiscal Year 2016, the Massachusetts Fair Labor Division received more than 6,000 complaints – up 33 percent from the prior year. We are notifying our valued MA employers about this significant increase in wage & hour complaints to remind you of the importance of complying with wage & hour laws.

An Oklahoma employer will pay $52K in back wages and damages after it failed to pay minimum wages and overtime to 9 employees. We are notifying our valued Oklahoma employers about this significant penalty to remind you of the importance of complying with wage & hour laws.

A PR employer will pay $3.5 million after violating the Health Insurance Portabilty and Accountability Act (HIPAA). We are notifying our valued PR employers about this significant penalty to remind you of the importance of complying with HIPAA.
